column1: Data Cleaning Logs – Law & Justice Crime Dataset
Standardized column names to maintain uniform naming conventions across the dataset.
Performed Find & Replace operations:
Replaced inconsistent state names (e.g., “DELHI/UT Total” to “Delhi”).
Standardized abbreviations (e.g., “A&N Islands” to “Andaman and Nicobar Islands”).
Replaced 0 entries representing no crime where applicable.
Checked for and removed duplicate records to ensure data accuracy.
Converted relevant columns to appropriate data types (numeric columns to Number format).
Standardized text formatting by converting uppercase entries to Proper Case.
Removed rare or irrelevant crime columns to focus analysis on significant crime categories.
Added a Total_Crimes column by summing all major crime categories.
Sorted the sheet alphabetically by State/UT for structured organization.
Updated district names from previous administrative names to current standardized names.
Merged split district entries (e.g., Kutch (East(G)) and Kutch (West-Bhuj)) into a single district by summing their values.
Ensured consistency between State/UT and District names across the dataset.
Analysis – Derived Columns
Added Total_Crimes by summing all major crime categories to calculate overall crime volume.
Added Violent_Crimes (Murder + Rape + Kidnapping & Abduction + Robbery + Assault on Women) to analyze serious offenses collectively.
Added Property_Crimes (Theft + Burglary + Other Property Offenses) to evaluate economic-related crime trends.
Added YoY_Growth_% using
(Current Year Total − Previous Year Total) / Previous Year Total × 100
to measure annual crime growth.
Calculated CAGR (2001–2012) to evaluate long-term crime growth trend across the dataset.
Added Crime_Against_Women_Total by summing rape, dowry deaths, assault on women, and kidnapping of women for focused gender-based crime analysis.
Added Violent_to_Property_Ratio to understand the distribution between severe and economic crimes over time.
Analysis – KPIs
Added Total Murders (2001–2012) using SUM aggregation.
Added Total Rapes (2001–2012) using SUM aggregation.
Added Total Districts Covered using COUNT DISTINCT of districts.
Added Overall YoY Growth % (Latest Year) to highlight recent growth trend.
Added Overall Crime CAGR (2001–2012) to measure long-term growth.
Added Grand Total Crimes to summarize the magnitude of crime across all years.

Created Year-wise Crime Summary Pivot
Created State-wise Crime Breakdown Pivot
Created Top 10 States by Total Crimes Pivot
Created District-wise Crime Pivot
Created Fastest Rising States by YoY Growth Pivot
Created Crime Against Women Pivot
Created Violent vs Property Crime Pivot
Created Offense Mix Share by Year Pivot
